description:
aacgain normalizes the volume of digital music files using the
    Replay Gain algorithm. It works by modifying the global_gain fields in the
    aac samples. Free-form metadata tags are added to the file to save undo
    information, making the normalization process reversable.
    http://github.com/svnpenn/p/tree/master/aacgain
author: David Lasker
